name: Present Dropper
description:
Present Dropper was made for the Extra Credits Jam of December 2018, and I can't say it went well.  Being the 3rd game in my 15 games - 12 months challenge, it was the first that I teamed up on.   I made all of the game, except someone I know and have worked with on other projects in the past helped me with the good art (Credits below).  It was made in approximately 3 or so hours because I was silly and didn't realize the deadline was as early as it was so that's fun.

Just drop presents on the houses by pressing space.

Good art by: https://twitter.com/Will_i_amGoad
